name: Cottage Cabin
description:
1 Queen Bed and sleeper sofa in main living area. Queen bed in loft.
Sleeps up to six people. 
Note: Loft is not full height. 
Kitchenette has a two burner stove, microwave, sink and fridge. All kitchen pots/pans, utensils, dishware, etc including in cabin. Bathroom with shower. Bedding and towels included.
Cabin has heating and AC.

These units are not pet friendly. $250 cleaning fee if pets are brought in.
If you are bringing your dog, please inquire about pet friendly cabins.

name: Conestoga Wagons
description:
Furnished with a King bed and one bunk bed; can sleep 4 people. Wagon includes mini fridge, wagon wheel table, electricity, WIFI and climate control. Each wagon has its own private bathhouse.

PETS ARE NOT PERMITTED.
Smoking is not permitted.
$500 daily fine will apply for violators of these offenses, and you will be asked to leave the resort immediately.

name: Deluxe Cabin
description:
One Bedroom with queen bed. Sleeper sofa in living area and queen bed in loft. 
Sleeps up to six people. 
Note: Loft is not full height. 
Kitchenette has a two burner stove, microwave, sink and fridge. Bathroom with shower.
All kitchen pots/pans, utensils, dishware, etc including in cabin. Bathroom with shower. Bedding and towels included.
Cabin has heating and AC.
These units are not pet friendly. $250 cleaning fee if pets are brought in.
If you are bringing your dog, please inquire about pet friendly cabins.

name: Premium Cabin
description:
Two Bedrooms with queen bed in each room. Sleeper sofa in living area and queen bed in loft. 
Sleeps up to eight people. 
Note: Loft is not full height. 
Kitchenette has a two burner stove, microwave, sink and fridge. Bathroom with shower.
All kitchen pots/pans, utensils, dishware, etc including in cabin. Bathroom with shower. Bedding and towels included.
Cabin has heating and AC.
These units are not pet friendly. $250 cleaning fee if pets are brought in.
If you are bringing your dog, please inquire about pet friendly cabins.

name: Safari Luxury Tents - King + Bunk
description:
Furnished with a King bed and one bunk bed; can sleep 4.  Includes mini fridge, Keurig machine, electricity, WiFi, Air Conditioning and Heating. Full private bathroom in unit. 

PETS ARE NOT PERMITTED.
Smoking is not permitted. $500 daily fine will apply for violators of this of these offenses and you will be asked to leave the resort immediately.

name: Premium Cabin
description:
Two Bedrooms with queen bed in each room. Sleeper sofa in living area and queen bed in loft. 
Sleeps up to eight people. 
Note: Loft is not full height. 
Kitchenette has a two burner stove, microwave, sink and fridge. Bathroom with shower.
All kitchen pots/pans, utensils, dishware, etc including in cabin. Bathroom with shower. Bedding and towels included.
Cabin has heating and AC.
Up to 2 dogs permits. $75 per dog cleaning fee.
Cats and other pets are not permitted.
